ThingDef.label: interference shielding
ThingDef.description: By utilizing a material that isresistant to psychic effects, we can create a Faraday cage around the brain, allowing the host to withstand any psychic assault.

ThingDef.label: cranial plating
ThingDef.description: By increasing the resilience of the skull, it becomes much more difficult to damage the brain.

ThingDef.label: multilayered dermal plating
ThingDef.description: By layering chitin plates under the skin and binding cracks with rubbery flesh, resistance to small arms fire is radically increased.

ThingDef.label: flame retardant skin
ThingDef.description: By lining the skin with glands that can quickly release flame retardant slime on the body as well as dissipating heat, the user becomes extremely resistant to heat and flame.

ThingDef.label: variable insulation skin
ThingDef.description: By creating skin with both high-volume sweat glands and hairs that can either retain or release heat, the user becomes comfortable in a massive range of temperatures.

ThingDef.label: calcium-alloy ribcage
ThingDef.description: By altering the composition of the ribcage into a calcium and metal alloy, and encasing the upper body in an organic rubber analogue, the durability of the upper body is immensely increased.
